: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw just laughs as KitKat leaves his chamber. This femme had a fire in her, a warriors spark. He really saw something in her.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She looked at perceptor as she left SharpClaw's chambers. "What are 
you looking at?" She said in a very angry voice.  Her pride had been 
hurt, not to mention her jaw. She looked at Perceptor and shook her 
head. "What? Never looked at a femme before?"

And with that, she went to he base entrance. There, she thought of 
Carnatron and his last transmission. She wondered what he could do 
for her to eliminate the maximals. But yet, her loyalty was to 
Hyrdas. And for that, she could not go against anything he said.

yet, her thoughts returned to SharpClaw. Why had he done this and why 
did he think he had to do this? This isn't like a Predacon to safe 
another from self destruction? maybe he's a maximal in disguise, she 
thought. Her optics shined with hate towards him.

<P align=center>SharpClaw just laughs as KitKat leaves his chamber. This femme had a fire in her, a warriors spark. He really saw something in her.
